titles: Manipur on edge: Protesters threaten to set themselves on fire, curfew clamped
paras: Following the arrest of a leader of the Meitei outfit Arambai Tenggol on Saturday night, tensions and protests erupted in several areas across five valley districts.

titles: Karnataka cops warned of staff crunch, crowd surge risk before RCB event
paras: A police letter issued hours before the RCB event in Bengaluru warned of inadequate security, manpower shortage, and lack of surveillance — concerns that materialised in a deadly stampede.

titles: Like a rugby player: Elon Musk's White House brawl was 'too much' for Trump
paras: Elon Musk and US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent were involved in a physical fight at the White House, which played a role in the dramatic fallout between Musk and Donald Trump.

titles: Shubhanshu Shukla defied limits in the sky before his sortie into space
paras: We look at how Gp. Capt. Shubhanshu Shukla's past life as a fighter test pilot prepared him to be India's first astronaut going to the Space Station.

titles: Can China turn off India's tap, hit land formation?
paras: The life-sustaining Brahmaputra runs from China's Tibet as the Yarlung Tsangpo. Can China block or divert the flow of Tsangpo and hit India's water supply and soil formation? Pakistan was into scare-mongering after India suspended the Indus Waters Treaty. This is what experts and data say about China and the Brahmaputra.

titles: Sachin Pilot breaks ice with Ashok Gehlot after 5 years. Courtesy Rajesh Pilot
paras: In a rare gesture hinting at reconciliation, Sachin Pilot met Ashok Gehlot in Jaipur after years of acrimony, personally inviting him to a memorial for his late father Rajesh Pilot.

titles: Watch: Gukesh picks his best Norway Chess moment. Carlsen can't stop laughing
paras: Five-time World Champion Magnus Carlsen couldn't help but smile at Norway Chess 2025 when Indian Grandmaster D. Gukesh named his favourite moment of the tournament.

titles: Man finds body of daughter, 9, stuffed inside suitcase in locked Delhi flat
paras: The body of a 9-year-old girl was found stuffed in a suitcase in New Delhi's Nehru Vihar, prompting a police investigation for suspected sexual assault.

titles: Jannik Sinner vs Carlos Alcaraz: All you need to know about French Open final
paras: French Open: Jannik Sinner and Carlos Alcaraz will face off in the grand finale of the men's singles on Sunday, June 8. While Sinner has is looking to win his maiden title at Roland Garros, Alcaraz is aiming to successfully defend his title.

titles: India must be at the table: Canadian PM amid backlash over G7 invite to Modi
paras: Mark Carney's comments came after some of his political opponents in Canada criticised him for inviting Prime Minister Narendra Modi to the G7 summit in view of a probe into allegations of Indian links to the killing of a Khalistani separatist in 2023.

titles: Covid-19 claims 4 lives in last 24 hours, active cases surge to 5,755
paras: Since January 2025, Maharashtra has recorded the highest Covid-19 death toll at 18, followed by Kerala with 12, as total active cases in India climbed to 5,755 on Sunday.

titles: Nepal man arrested in Hyderabad for killing lover, stuffing her body in travel bag
paras: A Nepali man has been arrested in Hyderabad for allegedly strangling his live-in partner after a quarrel over her pregnancy.

titles: Want to stay here too: Father cries over grave of son killed in Bengaluru stampede
paras: The video shows BT Lakshman, father of Bhumik Lakshman - one of the 11 victims who died in the stampede outside Bengaluru's M Chinnaswamy Stadium - crying inconsolably and refusing to leave his son's grave.

titles: Elderly UP man slits own throat on Bakrid, calls it sacrifice to Allah
paras: A 60-year-old man in Deoria died by suicide on Bakrid, leaving a note calling himself a "sacrifice to Allah."

titles: Shocking video shows Colombian presidential candidate getting shot during rally
paras: Colombian Senator Miguel Uribe Turbay was shot during a campaign event in Bogotá. His condition remains unclear. Authorities and his party condemned the attack and demanded an investigation.

titles: Watch: Andhra Minister's angry bouquet toss after official fails to answer query
paras: Andhra Pradesh Minister Savitha S threw a bouquet in frustration after a district tahasildar failed to answer her query about gas cylinder distribution. The video of the incident has gone viral, sparking criticism on social media.

titles: Hamraaz: A prophecy of Vimi's real-life tragedy
paras: 'Hamraaz' is a classic Bollywood film that blends romance, mystery, and tragedy against the backdrop of 1960s India. The movie also eerily reflects the real-life heartbreak of its lead actor Vimi, whose brief stardom was shadowed by personal turmoil and loss.

titles: Question Time: Weekly News Quiz
paras: Think you read the headlines this week? Let's test that!

titles: Protests spiral over Los Angeles immigration raids, Trump vows to 'crush rioters'
paras: Federal agents clashed with protesters in Los Angeles for a second day after immigration raids, prompting the Trump administration to deploy 2,000 National Guard troops amid rising tensions.

titles: Gauff hits back at Sabalenka's Swiatek in final claim after French Open triumph
paras: French Open champion Coco Gauff has responded to runner-up Aryna Sabalenka's claim that Iga Swiatek would have defeated her in the French Open final.

titles: How Eid al-Adha was celebrated across countries
paras: From prayers to the sacrifice of animals, a collection of photos shows how Eid al-Adha was celebrated in different tones across West Asia and in the Indian subcontinent.

titles: Don't miss the signs: Doctors warn of brain tumor surge among children
paras: According to the National Brain Tumor Society, approximately 5.7% of all primary brain tumors occur in children and adolescents aged 0-19 years.

titles: Couldn't save myself...: YouTuber Manish Kashyap says he is quitting BJP
paras: Popular YouTuber Manish Kashyap resigned from BJP during a Facebook Live, citing ineffectiveness and vowing to continue activism independently, possibly eyeing assembly elections.

titles: Shah Rukh Khan's sweet reaction to daughter Suhana's new Instagram post wins hearts
paras: Shah Rukh Khan has publicly appreciated his daughter Suhana Khan's recent pictures for Adidas India on Instagram. Suhana, who made her acting debut in 'The Archies', is set to star with her father in the upcoming film 'King'.
